scripts.build: tsc && vite build && npm run build:data
scripts.build:data: tsc src/data/index.ts src/data/perso_photos.ts src/data/scandals2000-2001.ts src/data/scandals2002-2003.ts src/data/scandals2004-2005.ts src/data/scandals2006-2007.ts src/data/scandals2008-2009.ts src/data/scandals2010-2011.ts src/data/scandals2012-2013.ts src/data/scandals2014-2015.ts src/data/scandals2016-2017.ts src/data/scandals2018-2019.ts src/data/scandals2020-2021.ts src/data/scandals2022-2023.ts src/data/scandals2024-2025.ts src/data/mockScandals.ts --outDir dist/data --target ES2022 --module ESNext --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop && npm run fix:data-structure && npm run fix:imports
